title: growth budget plan unveiled

title: Pastor Edwin Dadson, Spikenard Music International donate GH¢50,000 to Little Hearts Foundation
desc: Gospel minister Edwin Dadson, in partnership with Spikenard Music International, has donated GH¢50,000 to Little Hearts Foundation, a pediatric cardiac medical centre near Burna Camp, to support children living with congenital heart conditions.
